jchess.view.gamewindow

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jchess.view.gamewindow.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, IGameView, IView

    public class GameView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IGameView, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    This class with the help of custom control (child view) draws Chessboard, Clock, etc.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
